usage.cn: 我希望找到一个担心失去我的人。
usage.eng: I want someone who's afraid of losing me.

usage.cn: 如果我的未来有你在，那其他的什么我都不怕了。
usage.eng: If my future has you in it, I'm not afraid of the rest.

usage.cn: 为什么我还是如此的担心失去你，即使你都已经不是我的？
usage.eng: Why am I so afraid to lose you when you are not even mine?

usage.cn: 我不害怕明天，因为我经历过昨天，又热爱今天。
usage.eng: I am not afraid of tomorrow，for I have seen yesterday and love today.
